channel.title: Visualization Editor - Gantt feature missing from Chart Type
channel.description: Trying to create a timeline chart in Redash using the gantt for visualization type. When I select Visualization type --> Chart and select General tab --> Chart Type. It's missing from the drop down list. How do I configure to use it. There is also no customization option either. Thank you. vchambers

item.title: Visualization Editor - Gantt feature missing from Chart Type
item.dc:creator: vchambers
item.description:
Trying to create a timeline chart in Redash using the gantt for visualization type. When I select Visualization type → Chart and select General tab → Chart Type. It’s missing from the drop down list. How do I configure to use it. There is also no customization option either. Thank you. vchambers
